definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: Then you can preview the results in a text-only format before clicking on the link to go to the page.
sentences.chinese: 然後你可以預覽結果純文字格式，然後點擊連接去頁。

sentences.english: Eventually, we can guide them towards reading Chinese books.
sentences.chinese: 最後，才順勢將他們引導向閱讀純文字的華文書籍。

sentences.english: The clear-text password is never stored.
sentences.chinese: 絕不儲存純文字式密碼。

sentences.english: Basically a MUD is a game that simulates life with pure text.
sentences.chinese: MUD就是用純文字去模擬生活。

definition: (idiom) to have one's words turn out to be (tragically) prophetic
Six Records of a Floating Life, autobiographical novel and description of Qing dynasty life by 沈復|沈复[Shen3 Fu4], published 1808
see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3]
pinyin: niu2 tou2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3

definition: toss a peach, get back a plum (idiom); to return a favor/to exchange gifts/Scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours.
pun/play on words/a phrase with a double meaning
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
